en: Allah wants to accept your repentance,
but those who follow [their] passions want
you to digress [into] a great deviation.
And Allah wants to lighten for you [your difficulties];
do not consume one another's wealth unjustly

ar: إِلَّا أَن تَكُونَ تِجَرَةً عَن تَرَاضٍ مِّنكُمْ
en: but only [in lawful] business by mutual consent.
And do not kill yourselves [or one another].
Indeed, Allah is to you ever Merciful.
